description:
The Soul Man - Season 2 - Episode 9 (WEBRip - 720p) [PreAir]
---------------------------------------------------

The Soul Man returns for a second season with Cedric the Entertainer
as Reverend Boyce "The Voice" Ballentine, an R&B superstar-turned-minister
who takes over as preacher of his father's church. Niecy Nash also stars
as the reverend's wife, Lolli, who brings Vegas pizzazz to the church community.
This season, Boyce begins hosting a church podcast, and the Ballantines deal
with their fun-loving new houseguest, Boyce's younger brother Stamps.

Produced by TV Land, Hazy Mills and SamJen Productions.

 <a href="
http://imageshack.us/a/img62/5941/e601.png" rel="nofollow" target="_NEW">
http://imageshack.us/a/img62/5941/e601.png</a>

Lyric samples one of Boyce's songs, making Boyce and Lolli question
their parenting abilities; Stamps and Kim's relationship heats up.
